full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG L'U AI PA'I LUGS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA BDE CHEN ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035B DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG L'U AI PA'I LUGS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR BDE CHEN POR 'JUG CING DBANG BLANG BA'I CHO GA BDE CHEN ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'DUS PA DANG BDE MCHOG GI THUN MONG GI BSHAD RGYUD RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA LAS DBANG BCU BZHI'I RTZAM BZHAG GSUNG BA'I RJES SU 'BRANGS SHING, LO DRIL GNYIS THUN MONG GIS CHOG PA RNAMS RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO RANG NYID KYIS MDZAD PA'I DRIL BU PA'I DKYIL CHOG GZHIR BZHAG CING, LO DRIL GYI MI 'DRA BA'I KHYAD PAR DBYE DGOS PA RNAMS, D'A RI KA PA DANG, KHAMS RGYAL BA ZAB PA DANG, DKYIL CHOG RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA DANG, RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I LAM GYI RIM PAR GSUNGS PA DAG LAS, GANG 'JUG PA BDE DANG, SLABS SU JI LTAR BAB PA BZHIN BKOD DE, DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD KYI MKHYEN BRTZE CIG TU BSDUS PA'I @036A *, ,NGO BO, RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG DPER MA MCHIS PA'I RJE BTZUN BLA MA, RTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO NYID KYI ZHABS KYI PAD MO LA SPYI BOS REG PA'I RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS, ZHUNG NYANG STONG RIG PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYI SA'I CHA, DPAL RI BO MDANGS CAN GYI DGON PAR SBYAR BA'O,, ,,SVA STI, BDE MCHOG ZUNG 'JUG NOR BU'I RGYA MTSO LA, ,DBANG BSGUR MKHAS PA'I GLING DU GRANGS MED BYON, ,DE LAS 'ONGS PA'I LEGS BSHAD GA GA'I RGYUN, ,GANGS CAN LJONGS 'DIR BAB KYANG NYAMS DUS SU, ,RJE BTZUN LHA YI DBANG PO BLO BZANG MCHOG ,GRAGS PA 'BRUG STONG SGROG PAS SHES BYA'I MKHA', ,MA LUS BYABS PA'I MKHYEN BRTZE'I CHU 'DZIN LAS, ,LEGS BSHAD BDUD RTZI'I CHAR RGYUN MI BZANG PHAB, ,DGE LEGS BLO GROS YANGS PA'I RDZINNG MCHOG LA 'ANG, ,DPAL 'BYOR BZANG PO'I BRLABS PHRENG BA YOS PA LAS, ,DRANGS PA RI RNAM DAG DBANG BZHI'I CHU BO RGYUN, ,SKAL BZANG ZHING PA'I LO TOG RGYAS BYED 'DI, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA YUN DU GNAS PHYIR DANG, ,SANGS RGYAS SKYID KYI SGRIB GNYIS SBYANG BA'I PHYIR, ,'BYOR LDAN BTONG PHONG NAM MKHA' DBANG PHYUG GIS ,MTHUN RKYEN LEGS PAR SBYAR TE RIG BYED PA, ,GZHUNG BA SANGS RGYAS 'PHEL GYI RI MO LA, ,SPAR MKHAN MKHAS BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG POS BRKOS, ,DONG MA DGE BSKUL SDOM BRTZON BSOD 'PHEL GYIS, ,GRUB PA'I GNAS MCHOG GI DE DGON DU BSGRUBS, ,'DI YI PHYIR DU SGO GSUM 'BAD PA DANG, ,'BYOR BA CUNG ZAD BTANG BA'I RAB DKAR GYIS, ,'GRO BA KUN KYANG SMIN LAM 'DIR ZHUGS NAS, ,GROL BYED LAM GYIS ZUNG 'JUG MYUR THOB SHOG ,CHU PHO SPRE'U LO DYID ZLAR BA CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I DUS, DPAL LDAN GE RE KUN TU BZANG PO'I LEGS KHROD, MING GZHAN SKYID LUNG LHA SDINGS KYI DGON PAR GRUB PA'O,, ,,DGE'O,
